greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{d_<n | n} (d_<n) * tau(n / d_<n), where d_<n = divisors of n that are less than n, tau(x) = A000005(x).
comment: Numbers n such that n divides a(n) are given in A068978.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..27144 (first 1000 terms from Jaroslav Krizek)
maple: for n from 1 to q do
mathematica: Table[Sum[d*DivisorSigma[0, n/d], {d, Most[Divisors[n]]}], {n, 100}] (* _T. D. Noe_, Apr 27 2012 *)
results.author: _Jaroslav Krizek_, Apr 20 2012
